_metadata.description: 15-point SOC 2 Type II validation checklist. We read the report.

checklist.pass_criteria: Your specific product/service explicitly named in scope description
Security (required). Availability, Confidentiality, PI, Privacy as applicable.
No carve-outs for components in your data path. If carved out, document gap.
Controls described map to risks identified in Pack 01 assessment
Type II (tested), not Type I (described only)
Count, materiality, and remediation status documented
Unqualified opinion preferred. Qualified = significant finding.
All CUECs identified and mapped to internal controls
Acknowledged and remediated, not explained away
No new exceptions in same categories. No persistent unresolved findings.
Storage locations documented and aligned with regulatory requirements
If report period doesn't cover today, bridging letter attests no material changes
